attributes.action: do the hokey-cokey and turn around, cos that's what it's all about!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it would make great entertainment for the British public, and restore all our faith in the hokey-cokey too.  This would be a joy to watch, even Cherie Blair could join in too!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
